entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
